ðŸ“– Summary: IPBan is a free, open-source security software for Windows and Linux that automatically blocks IP addresses attempting to gain unauthorized access to servers. It monitors system logs and event viewers for failed login attempts and uses firewall rules to ban malicious IPs, protecting servers from hackers and botnets.
